title: To the Woods
description: To the Woods describes a young girl's observations of woodland animals and plants. The text has a repetitive pattern that reinforces key vocabulary words. Illustrations support the text.
meta: bushes, climbs, crawl, hiding, squirrel, woods
Use the strategy of making, revising, and confirming predictions based on information in the text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and details
Short Vowels : Read words with the short /i/ vowel sound
Verbs : Recognize and use verbs in sentences

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
